content: List down 25 words that end with 'ly'.

1. Quickly
2. Slowly
3. Happily
4. Sadly
5. Quietly
6. Loudly
7. Gently
8. Roughly
9. Carefully
10. Carelessly
11. Honestly
12. Deceptively
13. Regularly
14. Irregularly
15. Usually
16. Occasionally
17. Frequently
18. Rarely
19. Seriously
20. Playfully
21. Secretly
22. Openly
23. Secretly
24. Publicly
25. Privately
